list.text: Gasket MountA gasket mount uses gasket material between the plate and keyboard housing on both top and bottom sides. This gives the board a slightly more cushioned feel since the plate isnâ€™t in direct contact with the other metal components of the keyboard.
list.content:
Gasket Mount


A gasket mount uses gasket material between the plate and keyboard housing on both top and bottom sides. This gives the board a slightly more cushioned feel since the plate isnâ€™t in direct contact with the other metal components of the keyboard.
